title: RAR-Extract v.2.0.0 – Fast speed and good efficiency extractor
content: Enolsoft RAR Extract for Mac extracts the files contained in 7z, Cab, CHM, COM, Hfs, ISO, Nsis, Rar, Tar, Udf, Wim, Zip archives with fast speed and good efficiency. Features Highlight Double clicks to expand 7z,Cab,CHM,COM,Hfs,ISO,Nsis,Rar,Tar,Udf,Wim,Zip archives. Supports to unzip password protected RAR files.
